subject: Layoffs and Job Reductions
Automobile Racing
Fines (Penalties)
Cheating
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: As the Sprint Cup playoff enters the second half of the Chase, the fallout from the scandal at Richmond International Raceway has widened, with Michael Waltrip Racing eliminating 15 percent of its staff.
snippet: As the Sprint Cup playoff enters the second half of the Chase, the fallout from the scandal at Richmond International Raceway has widened, with Michael Waltrip Racing eliminating 15 percent of its staff.
